name: Desert Bus Speedway
description:
Harkening back to the classic arcade racing feel of games like Daytona USA and Cruisin' Exotica, Desert Bus Speedway seeks to capture the essence of racing and what makes driving fun. Three tracks await you, each ready to test your mettle with their own unique layout and theme . Easy to learn, difficult to perfect!

This bus is exclusively manual transmission, as all racing should be - if you're not familiar with how to use a clutch, don't worry, it's easy! Let go of the gas, hold down on the clutch, and shift up or down as your little heart desires, and then release the clutch - it's really that easy! I promise, it'll make the racing experience that much more engaging and satisfying to master!

Desert Bus Speedway was designed and developed in one week for the Desert Bus for Hope 2021 Game Jam. Due to whosever twisted soul submitted this year's theme of "Long Haul", I have added and painstakingly playtested the 50 lap Long Haul mode for each level. For any masochists I mean, racing enthusiasts out there, try to beat the Long Haul mode on all three levels!
